name: IL-2 Shturmovik. Battle of Kursk - Combat Gunship Flight Simulator
name_original: IL-2 Shturmovik. Battle of Kursk - Combat Gunship Flight Simulator
description:
3D Games presents " IL-2 Shturmovik. Battle of Kursk " second part of the award winning "Ilyushin IL-2 Shturmovik ". The Battle of Kursk was a World War II engagement between German and Soviet forces on the Eastern Front near Kursk in the Soviet Union during July and August 1943. In " IL-2 Shturmovik. Battle of Kursk " You become a pilot of the 1 st Attack Air Division.

" IL-2 Shturmovik. Battle of Kursk " is powered by Unreal Engine technology. By using Epic Games' award-winning, most advanced game engine, our Combat Flight Simulator brings in the game such incredible detailed graphics, real-time lighting with a unique physics and weapon system that has not been here yet. You will not believe it's only a game for mobile devices!

FORGET EVERYTHING ELSE! THIS IS THE ULTIMATE WWII AIR-TO-GROUND COMBAT GAME!
With an extensive single player missions and the non-stop action will keep you at the edge of your seat! You’ll participate in fierce attacks on protected convoys of enemy's vehicles, tanks, bridges and even airfields. Everything is set up in accurately recreated locations.

Become the supreme lord of the skies!

CONSOLE QUALITY GAMING AND IT’S ONLY ON iOS!
Unparalleled visuals, special effects and audio including: specular masks, normal mapping, bump mapping, atmospheric scattering, realistic lighting, sun glare, high
definition textures, 4x anisotropic filtering, HDR rendering, radial blur and more!

OPTIMIZED ON THE NEW iPAD AIR AND iPHONE 5S
Optimized for iPhone 5S and iPad Air with the new A7 processors with greater environmental detail, spectacular visual effects and unparalleled performance!

RESTRICTIONS
Due to the high quality graphics and demanding real-time physics calculations this game is not recommended for older devices including the iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 1 and iPad 1
